languages.text: "Воистину, я тоже грешна, и мне воздастся должное за мои поступки. Но дух каждого слуги Его может дать слабину. Именно потому что я это понимаю, я сейчас стою перед тобой с мольбой, а не с мечом".

"Truly, I too have erred, and I will receive my due for the things I have done. But the spirit of any of His servants may falter. It is because I understand this that I now stand before you with a plea, and not with a sword."
languages.original_text: "Воистину, я тоже грешна, и мне воздастся должное за мои поступки. Но дух каждого слуги Его может дать слабину. Именно потому что я это понимаю, я сейчас стою перед тобой с мольбой, а не с мечом".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, I am a sinner myself, and I will receive my just due for things I have done. For no servant of His is immune from the strength of their spirit giving way. And my knowledge of that is the exact reason I am now standing before you with a plea rather than a sword."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, I am a sinner myself, and I will receive my just due for things I have done. For no servant of His is immune from the strength of their spirit giving way. And my knowledge of that is the exact reason I am now standing before you with a plea rather than a sword."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Truly, I am also a sinner, and I will receive my just due for the things I've done. But the spirit of any of His servants may falter. It is because I understand this that I now stand before you with a plea, and not with a sword."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Truly, I am also a sinner, and I will receive my just due for the things I've done. But the spirit of any of His servants may falter. It is because I understand this that I now stand before you with a plea, and not with a sword."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Truly, I too have erred, and I will receive my due for the things I have done. But the spirit of any of His servants may falter. It is because I understand this that I now stand before you with a plea, and not with a sword."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Truly, I too have erred, and I will receive my due for the things I have done. But the spirit of any of His servants may falter. It is because I understand this that I now stand before you with a plea, and not with a sword."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Cierto es que también yo he errado, y recibiré el castigo que merezco por las cosas que he hecho. Pero entiendo que el espíritu de cualquiera de Sus siervos pueda flaquear. Y precisamente por eso comparezco ante usted esgrimiendo una súplica y no una espada».
languages.original_text: "Truly, I too have erred, and I will receive my due for the things I have done. But the spirit of any of His servants may falter. It is because I understand this that I now stand before you with a plea, and not with a sword."

traits.locale_text: «Cierto es que también yo he pecado, y recibiré el castigo que merezco por las cosas que he hecho. Pero entiendo que el espíritu de cualquiera de Sus siervos pueda flaquear. Y precisamente por eso comparezco ante usted esgrimiendo una súplica y no una espada».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “没错，我也曾犯下过罪行，我会为我的罪行得到应得的报应。我明白，帝皇每位仆人的心都有可能会动摇。正因如此，我没有带着利剑，而是带着恳求来到你面前。”
languages.original_text: "Truly, I too have erred, and I will receive my due for the things I have done. But the spirit of any of His servants may falter. It is because I understand this that I now stand before you with a plea, and not with a sword."

traits.locale_text: “没错，我也是个罪人，我会为我的罪行得到应得的报应。我明白，帝皇每位仆人的心都有可能会动摇。正因如此，我没有带着利剑，而是带着恳求来到你面前。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Il est vrai que je me suis moi-même écartée du droit chemin et que je recevrai mon juste châtiment pour mes actions, mais il peut arriver que l'esprit de Ses serviteurs faiblisse. C'est parce que je le comprends que je suis venue ici pour vous supplier et non pour vous menacer, l'épée à la main. »
languages.original_text: "Truly, I too have erred, and I will receive my due for the things I have done. But the spirit of any of His servants may falter. It is because I understand this that I now stand before you with a plea, and not with a sword."

traits.locale_text: « Il est vrai que je suis moi-même une pécheresse et que je recevrai mon propre châtiment pour tout ce que j'ai pu faire, mais il peut arriver que l'esprit de Ses serviteurs faiblisse. C'est parce que je le comprends que je suis venue ici pour vous supplier et non pour vous menacer, l'épée à la main. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「そうだな、私も過ちを犯した。そして私は、己のしたことの報いを受けることになるだろう。だが、主のしもべであれば誰でも、その精神がくじけることがある。このことを理解しているからこそ、私は今、剣ではなく、嘆願を持ってあなたの前に立っているのだ」
languages.original_text: "Truly, I too have erred, and I will receive my due for the things I have done. But the spirit of any of His servants may falter. It is because I understand this that I now stand before you with a plea, and not with a sword."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだな、私も過ちを犯した。そして私は、己のしたことの報いを受けることになるだろう。だが、主のしもべであれば誰でも、その精神がくじけることがある。このことを理解しているからこそ、私は今、剣ではなく、嘆願を持ってあなたの前に立っているのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wahrlich, auch ich bin fehlgegangen, und ich werde meine Strafe für meine Taten erhalten. Doch der Geist eines jeden Dieners des Imperators kann wanken. Weil mir das bewusst ist, stehe ich mit einer Bitte vor Euch, nicht mit einer Klinge."
languages.original_text: "Truly, I too have erred, and I will receive my due for the things I have done. But the spirit of any of His servants may falter. It is because I understand this that I now stand before you with a plea, and not with a sword."

traits.locale_text: "Wahrlich, ich bin auch eine Sünderin, und ich werde meine Strafe für meine Taten erhalten. Doch der Geist eines jeden Dieners des Imperators kann wanken. Weil mir das bewusst ist, stehe ich mit einer Bitte vor Euch, nicht mit einer Klinge."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ben de hata ettim, yaptıklarımın cezasını çekeceğim. O'nun hizmetkârları da sendeleyebilir. Bunu bildiğim için karşına bir kılıçla değil, sözlerimle çıktım."
languages.original_text: "Truly, I too have erred, and I will receive my due for the things I have done. But the spirit of any of His servants may falter. It is because I understand this that I now stand before you with a plea, and not with a sword."

traits.locale_text: "Ben de hata ettim, yaptıklarımın cezasını çekeceğim. Fakat O'nun hizmetkârları da sendeleyebilir. Bunu anladığım için karşında bir kılıç değil sözlerimle duruyorum."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
